page.title: 10SHOPPING IN BLOFIELD
page.content: In Blofield there are several shops including a small supermarket, aPost Office and general stores, a bakery, a newsagent, a hairdresser, a fish and chip shop and a clothes shop. Most of the shops are quite small and are run as family businesses. They are mostly used by people living in Blofield for their everyday needs, but many people travel into Norwich by car for their large weekly shop of groceries, going to one of the large supermarkets, such as Asda or Sainsburys,where there is a larger choice of goods and prices are cheaper. They also use the larger shops in the city for such things as clothes,shoes and electrical goods.
